page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
Material has been collected during visits, tours, and from talking to local people. The work for Queens Park School was undertaken by pupils from LIVS namely, K,Bysouth, S. Clark, D. Collins, K. Fannan, L. Idoux, S. Jowitt, F. Newton, S. Nuttall,C. Okoronkwo S. Goff. Part of the work was done by pupils from form II namely B. Owen and S. Hughes. The editing and organisation of pupils' work was completed by Mrs M. Pritchard and Mrs S. Morris. ..
Facilities to do this work were granted and encouraged by the headmaster Mr P. Glynne Thomas during the summer term 1985.
